title: Trump poised for historic UFO disclosure as daughter-in-law confirms extraterrestrial speech
description: President Donald Trump's daughter-in-law revealed that he has a speech ready to address potential UFO discoveries.

title: Giant ‘hidden in plain sight UFO is being guarded at secret mountain base'
description: A US congressman believes that a major country is hiding the existence of aliens, and that more support is needed to unveil the truth about extraterrestrial life on Earth

title: Lara Trump Speaks Again About President's Rumored UFO Speech
description: The president's daughter-in-law said she was aware of claims that a speech referring to UFOs was "queued up."

title: Secret UFO that’s so huge it’s had a building constructed AROUND it is ‘hiding in plain sight’, US congressman claims
description: A MASSIVE UFO is hiding in plain sight in a secret overseas location, according to bombshell claims by a United States congressman. Rep Eric Burlison said on Monday that the facility is "guarded like it's some kind of commodity" and has previously claimed that Donald Trump has been "fully briefed" on the existence of aliens....

title: Pentagon Secret Blows Up As UFO Whistleblower Claims Two Giant Alien Craft Buried In South Korea And Oklahoma
description: Dr. Steven Greer claims two massive alien crafts are hidden in South Korea and Oklahoma, sparking debate on extraterrestrial activity and government secrecy.
